title: Salsa tunes up the Timberjack hardtail w/ Alternator 2.0 dropouts, new geo, SS & more
content:
Salsa Cycles is back with an updated Timberjack with plenty of options. Aiming to create a versatile aggressive trail hardtail, the new Timberjack includes an all new frame with a bunch of updates to make the bike more fun on the trail – and also more versatile. Starting with an aluminum frame that’s meant for […]

The post Salsa tunes up the Timberjack hardtail w/ Alternator 2.0 dropouts, new geo, SS & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
